title: Is 'How To Win Friends & Influence People' by Dale Carnegie overrated? - Quora
tags: How to Win Friends and Influence People (1936 book)

response.answer_text: its really a good book to make some new friends but the only weak point i saw in the book is that it is on american culture so there are some advice which cannot be followed in Indian culture or some other culture. otherwise that the book is full of knowlege.happy reading
